text: Debipur Milan Vidyapith is a high school in the Haldia subdivision of the Purba Medinipur district, West Bengal, India, near Sitananda College. The school was established on January 12, 1948. The school is affiliated with the West Bengal Board of Secondary Education (WBBSE) and the West Bengal Council of Higher Secondary Education (WBCHSE). ==History== Debipur Milan Vidyapith was established on January 12, 1948, in the remote region of Agadir Nandigram, in the Purba Medinipur district. The establishment of this school honored the memory of Swami Vivekananda and Arnalok of the Ushalagan. ==Subjects offered== * Bengali (A) * English (B) * Mathematics * Physics * Chemistry * Biology * History * Geography * Sanskrit * Philosophy * Economics * Computer Application ==See also== * Kalikapur High School ==References== ==External links== * * *West Bengal Board of Secondary Education. *West Bengal Council of Higher Secondary Education Category: Educational institutions established in 1948 Category:1948 establishments in India Category: Schools in Purba Medinipur district Category: High schools and secondary schools in West Bengal Category: Co-educational schools in India
title: Debipur Milan Vidyapith
